title: unexpected panic

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I accidentally broke the compilation. The compiler output asked me to report this here: ### Code https://github.com/aWeinzierl/minesweeper-rs/tree/uwp ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.52.0-nightly (9b471a3f5 2021-02-19) binary: rustc commit-hash: 9b471a3f5fe57e5c6e08acf665f2094422415a3d commit-date: 2021-02-19 host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc release: 1.52.0-nightly LLVM version: 11.0.1 ``` Windows 10 Pro `[System.Environment]::OSVersion.Version`: ``` Major Minor Build Revision ----- ----- ----- -------- 10 0 19042 0 ``` ### Error output ``` cargo +nightly build -Z build-std=std,panic_abort --target x86_64-uwp-windows-msvc --verbose Fresh core v0.0.0 (C:\Users\andre\.rustup\toolchains\nightly-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc\lib\rustlib\src\rust\library\core) Fresh cc v1.0.60 Fresh rustc-std-workspace-core v1.99.0 (C:\Users\andre\.rustup\toolchains\nightly-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc\lib\rustlib\src\rust\library\rustc-std-workspace-core) Fresh compiler_builtins v0.1.39 Fresh libc v0.2.85 Fresh alloc v0.0.0 (C:\Users\andre\.rustup\toolchains\nightly-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc\lib\rustlib\src\rust\library\alloc) Fresh cfg-if v0.1.10 Fresh adler v0.2.3 Fresh rustc-demangle v0.1.18 Fresh rustc-std-workspace-alloc v1.99.0 (C:\Users\andre\.rustup\toolchains\nightly-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc\lib\rustlib\src\rust\library\rustc-std-workspace-alloc) Fresh unwind v0.0.0 (C:\Users\andre\.rustup\toolchains\nightly-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc\lib\rustlib\src\rust\library\unwind) Fresh panic_abort v0.0.0 (C:\Users\andre\.rustup\toolchains\nightly-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc\lib\rustlib\src\rust\library\panic_abort) Fresh gimli v0.23.0 Fresh panic_unwind v0.0.0 (C:\Users\andre\.rustup\toolchains\nightly-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc\lib\rustlib\src\rust\library\panic_unwind) Fresh miniz_oxide v0.4.0 Fresh hashbrown v0.9.0 Fresh object v0.22.0 Fresh v0.2.0 Fresh ppv-lite86 v0.2.10 Fresh proc-macro2 v1.0.24 Fresh getrandom v0.1.16 Fresh quote v1.0.9 Fresh rand_core v0.5.1 Compiling bindings v0.1.0 'compiler\rustc_resolve\src\imports.rs:903:25: inconsistent resolution for an import', /rustc/9b471a3f5fe57e5c6e08acf665f2094422415a3d\library\std\src\panic.rs:59:5 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` Backtrace
